docs.abstract: Find out how to change the background color of your Word documents.
docs.snippet: Find out how to change the background color of your Word documents.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I have upgraded to Windows 10 and would like to tint the text area when working with Word. I only have one eye and the bright screen is uncomfortable.

docs.abstract: With time and use, actions like installing or uninstalling programs may inadvertently alter these permissions from their initial state, but there’s a fix to restore them.
docs.snippet: With time and use, actions like installing or uninstalling programs may inadvertently alter these permissions from their initial state, but there’s a fix to restore them.

headline.main: Understanding Mac OS X Disk Permissions, and How to Repair Them
headline.print_headline: How to Repair Mac Disk Permissions

docs.abstract: The premier met with technology executives over the weekend to seek ideas and assistance in bringing his nation fully into the digital world.
docs.snippet: The premier met with technology executives over the weekend to seek ideas and assistance in bringing his nation fully into the digital world.
docs.lead_paragraph: MENLO PARK, Calif. — Narendra Modi and Mark Zuckerberg have much in common.

headline.main: Narendra Modi, Indian Premier, Courts Silicon Valley to Try to Ease Nation’s Poverty

docs.abstract: How to change the setting in Microsoft Edge, the default browser for Windows 10.

docs.abstract: If your computer did not come with a microphone, you can command Microsoft’s virtual assistant with an external or headset microphone.

docs.abstract: Peace has broken out between Google and Microsoft, which agreed to dismiss all of their pending patent lawsuits against each other.

docs.lead_paragraph: Peace has broken out between Google and Microsoft, which agreed to dismiss all of their pending patent lawsuits against each other.

headline.main: Microsoft and Google Call an End to Patent Battles

docs.abstract: Microsoft’s Internet calling unit did not specify how many of its roughly 300 million global users were affected.
docs.snippet: Microsoft’s Internet calling unit did not specify how many of its roughly 300 million global users were affected.
docs.lead_paragraph: Users of Skype, Microsoft’s Internet calling unit, faced a lengthy blackout on Monday after people worldwide were not able to make calls or sign into the service.

headline.main: Skype Service Problems for Some Users Worldwide

docs.abstract: The company created its Amazon Appstore app for Android shoppers, but it has now released the Amazon Underground app to provide access to its digital goods.

docs.abstract: Office 2016 has numerous changes, with the most prominent ones designed to improve how the software is used by groups of people to collaborate.
docs.snippet: Office 2016 has numerous changes, with the most prominent ones designed to improve how the software is used by groups of people to collaborate.
docs.lead_paragraph: Microsoft is giving one of its most successful products, Office, a big update. Consumers who use the software should get used to seeing more of them.

headline.main: Microsoft Releases Office 2016, With Features Focused on Teamwork
